nodes.text: The Cadavine Sector Fleet Imperial Enclave was the central Imperial stronghold of the Cadavine Sector Fleet in the remote Cadavine sector of the Outer Rim Territories, located on the moon of Gall, orbiting the gas giant Zhar in the Zhar system.

In 3.5 ABY, the bounty hunter Boba Fett took sanctuary at the Enclave while still in possession of the carbonite-frozen body of Han Solo, to seek repairs on his starship, the Slave I. The Rebel Alliance organized a small party to try and rescue Solo from Fett, but the Imperial forces present at the Enclave repelled the Rebels during the Battle of Gall.
